author: Yu-Kai Chang
intro: I'm specialized in using Vue.js and LayaAir, a H5 game engine, and familiar with TypeScript. And I also have experience in digital drawing and UI / UX design. I'm patient and passionate about teamwork and have confidence in completing projects independently.

In my current position, I'm mainly responsible for building up casino games and the front-end website. I'm capable of designing AWD and RWD layouts and logic for different devices or platforms, and also act as a communication bridge between the art designers and the back-end programmers to develop projects more efficiently. I also have ever joined projects about designing educational games and taught mathematics and programming as a part-time teacher.

I'm willing to take any position related to web, game design or digital creation. I'm always devoted to my job and will be appreciated to have the opportunity of making contributions to the company with my talents and experiences.
